name: test_query_results_cannot_be_retrieved_when_action_denied_for_group

statusDetails.message:

description:
As a user
        When I have `product:consume` action denied for a group that user belongs to (for gateway and registry)
        And I retrieve query results
        Then I get an error response

labels.name: story
labels.value: Query results cannot be retrieved when `product:consume` action denied for group for gateway and registry

labels.name: tag
labels.value: @pytest.mark.xfail(reason='Bug https://neom.atlassian.net/browse/NEOS-3266 [BE] 500 error when user without product:consume permissions tries to list products or run statement (GET powerbi/products, POST powerbi/statement)')
